trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>o evento é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outro controlo de servidor está a ser movido dentro da sua própria zona, ou para outra zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ocorrer quando um utilizador arrasta um controlo, tanto quando há uma mudança programática.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete or to track the user action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento é originado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>método e fornece uma oportunidade para cancelar o processo de mover antes de terminar ou para controlar a ação do utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a mudança ser concluída e o controlo colocado numa nova posição, este evento é seguido de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartMovingEventArgs class contains information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartMovingEventArgs contém informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being moved and the zone it is being moved to.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso para o controlo de peças Web que está a ser movido e a zona que está a ser movido para.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control being moved.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou outro controlo de servidor que está a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The target <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to which `webPart` is being moved.
trans-unit.target: O destino <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> ao qual `webPart` está a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of `webPart` relative to other controls within `zone`.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica o índice da `webPart` relativamente de outros controlos `zone`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts zone to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a zona de peças Web ao qual o controlo de peças Web está a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> para que o controlo de peças Web está a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index position of a Web Parts control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição de índice de um controlo de peças Web dentro da sua zona.

trans-unit.source: The ZoneIndex property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being moved in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ZoneIndex indica o número de ordem numérica (ou posição ordinal) na zona para o controlo de peças Web a ser movido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo utiliza esta propriedade para controlar e gerir a sua coleção de controlos de peças Web numa página Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The value of the ZoneIndex property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > O valor da propriedade ZoneIndex para um controlo poderá não ser igual um valor de índice para o controlo dentro do mesmo a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: A ordem numérica de um controlo dentro do respetivo zona.

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro controlo numa zona tem um valor de índice de zero.
